t:
“I'm a demon.”

“What?”

“Yeah, I was sent to Earth to destroy it, but I fell in love with a human girl and decided not to do it. So the Devil sent me here as punishment.”
c:
“Why are you telling me this now?”

“Because the Devil found me again. I have a week to complete my mission.”

“So why are you telling me?”

”I want you to take care of my son.”



#humanAIcollaboration: This story was completed by an AI.





#demon #love #save
